---
id: start-listening
title: "StartListening"
description: "In walkie-talkie mode, the AI agent starts listening. For enabling walkie-talkie mode, please refer to the AdvancedConfig.CommunicationMode parameter description in [Create Agent Instance](/aiagent-server/api-reference/agent-instance-management/create-agent-instance)."
api: 
info_path: core_products/aiagent/en/server/api-reference/agent-instance-control/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StartListening</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


In walkie-talkie mode, the AI agent starts listening. For enabling walkie-talkie mode, please refer to the AdvancedConfig.CommunicationMode parameter description in [Create Agent Instance](/aiagent-server/api-reference/agent-instance-management/create-agent-instance).
## Request
